answers.answer: You're convinced he has no issues with the kidneys?  Has he been checked for diabetes?  It might simply be the change of the weather, but that is a lot of drinking.

question: I am from New Delhi, India.My 8 year old son started drinking more water and pee more 2 seasons back in summers I took him to ped his urine test normal, then in winters it was ok then last summer same thing repeated I took him to ped again he ordered urine test and KFT blood, every thing came back normal. In winters it perfectly ok now since this summer started in april he has again started feeling thirsty and peeing a lot.His weight is fine, no weight loss, appetite ok, vision ok, not tired.In night too he wakes up 2 or 3 times pees and then drinks some water and again wakes up then peesand he pees a lot every time.I am worried.
title: my 8 year son pees and drinks a lot every summers, winters ok
